snippet: EdX, the nonprofit online consortium, is joining forces with the Internet corporation on an open-source platform and Web site to help others offer courses to a global audience.
abstract: Harvard and Massachusetts Institute of Technology join forces with Google to start open-source learning platform Open edX.
lead_paragraph: EdX, the nonprofit online consortium, is joining forces with the Internet corporation on an open-source platform and Web site to help others offer courses to a global audience.

headline.main: Course Provider Joins Google to Start Learning Platform
headline.print_headline: Harvard and M.I.T. Team With Google
